title: [D3+] OOL Squad looking for Top laner for Split 2
body:
We are looking for a Top laner to join us for Split 2 of OOL.

Requirements:
Diamond 3 minimum in solo queue.
Working Microphone
Discord
Good availability during weekdays
Willingness to learn
Can handle criticism from coaches
Passionate about improving as a team

What we bring:
Two high level coaches
Structured team environments

Contact IGN: Everin or Midam
